name: Happy Bankrupt
description:
Who would have thought being poor was so hard ?.. Features : 
  • Decision making
  • Money management
  • Trash humor
  • 50+ hilarious events
  • Game made in 72 hours (LD40)
Description:

In Happy Bankrupt, you play a rich old man that wants to get rid of his money, but destiny doesn't always agree with you.

Random dilemnas will be proposed to you, and that's your call to make the right choice.

Through your journey to be poor, you are probably going to make friends, and enemies. And some of them could cross your path again.

Each one of your encounter have specific consequences that may or may not help you later on.

If you have any questions and/or suggestions, feel free to contact us through Itch.io.
